tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE topographic_survey_data (
    survey_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    survey_date DATE,
    surveyor_name VARCHAR(50),
    location_id INTEGER,
    elevation REAL
);

CREATE TABLE SurveyPoints (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  point_name VARCHAR(50),
  x_coordinate FLOAT,
  y_coordinate FLOAT,
  z_coordinate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE SurveyMeasurements (
   id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   point_id INT REFERENCES SurveyPoints(id),
   measurement_type VARCHAR(50),
   measurement_value FLOAT,
   measurement_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SurveyReports (
   id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   report_name VARCHAR(100),
   report_date DATE,
   surveyor_name VARCHAR(50),
   feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE SurveyData (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  surveyor_name VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  survey_date DATE NOT NULL,
  elevation DECIMAL,
  terrain_type VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE SurveyPoints (
  point_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  survey_id UUID REFERENCES SurveyData(id) NOT NULL,
  latitude DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  longitude DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  point_description TEXT
);
